mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(lpp.plan_pats_status) c,MONTH(lpp.next_date) m,lpp.plan_pats_status FROM leanin_plan_patient lpp WHERE YEAR(lpp.next_date) = #{time} and lpp.plan_num in ( select lpi.plan_num from leanin_plan_info lpi where lpi.plan_duty_per = #{userId} and lpi.plan_status = 0 and lpi.plan_type =1 ) GROUP BY lpp.plan_pats_status,MONTH(lpp.next_date) ORDER BY MONTH(lpp.next_date) ASC

SELECT lpp.`next_date`, lau.`admin_name`, lpp.`form_id`, lfi.`form_name`, lpi.plan_duty_per, CASE lpp.`form_status` WHEN 1 THEN '未读' WHEN 2 THEN '已读' ELSE '其他' END AS form_status FROM `leanin_plan_patient` lpp, `leanin_plan_info` lpi,`leanin_admin_user` lau,`leanin_form_info` lfi WHERE lpi.`plan_num` = lpp.`plan_num` AND lpi.plan_type = 2 -- AND lpp.`patient_status` = 1 AND lpp.`form_id` = lfi.`form_num` AND lpi.`plan_duty_per` = lau.`admin_id` AND lpp.patient_id = #{patientId} UNION ALL SELECT loe.`send_time` as next_date, loe.`send_user` as plan_duty_per, lfi.`form_name`, loe.`form_id`, lau.admin_name, CASE loe.`form_status` WHEN 1 THEN '未读' WHEN 2 THEN '已读' ELSE '其他' END AS form_status FROM `leanin_online_edu` loe,`leanin_form_info` lfi,`leanin_admin_user` lau WHERE loe.`form_id` = lfi.`form_num` AND lau.admin_id = loe.send_user AND loe.send_status = 2 AND loe.patient_id = #{patientId}

SELECT lpp.`next_date`, lau.`admin_name`, lfi.`form_name`, lfi.`form_num`, lpp.`handle_sugges`, lpi.plan_duty_per, lpp.form_record_id, CASE lpp.`plan_pats_status` WHEN -1 THEN '收案' WHEN 0 THEN '未发送表单' WHEN 1 THEN '待随访' WHEN 2 THEN '已完成' WHEN 3 THEN '已过期' WHEN 4 THEN '无法接听' WHEN 5 THEN '号码错误' WHEN 6 THEN '拒绝接听' WHEN 7 THEN '无人接听' WHEN 8 THEN '家属接听' WHEN 9 THEN '患者不合作' WHEN 10 THEN '无联系电话' ELSE '其他' END AS state FROM `leanin_plan_info` lpi,`leanin_plan_patient` lpp,`leanin_form_info` lfi,`leanin_admin_user` lau WHERE lpi.`plan_num` = lpp.`plan_num` -- AND lpp.patient_status = 1 AND lpi.plan_type = 1 AND lpi.`plan_duty_per` = lau.`admin_id` AND lpp.`form_id` = lfi.`form_num` AND lpp.patient_id = #{patientId} UNION ALL SELECT lfr.`next_date`, lau.`admin_name`, lfi.`form_name`, lfi.`form_num`, lfr.`handle_sugges`, lpi.plan_duty_per, lfr.form_record_id, CASE lfr.`plan_pats_status` WHEN -1 THEN '收案' WHEN 0 THEN '未发送表单' WHEN 1 THEN '待随访' WHEN 2 THEN '已完成' WHEN 3 THEN '已过期' WHEN 4 THEN '无法接听' WHEN 5 THEN '号码错误' WHEN 6 THEN '拒绝接听' WHEN 7 THEN '无人接听' WHEN 8 THEN '家属接听' WHEN 9 THEN '患者不合作' WHEN 10 THEN '无联系电话' ELSE '其他' END AS state FROM `leanin_plan_info` lpi,`leanin_follow_record` lfr, `leanin_form_info` lfi,`leanin_admin_user` lau WHERE lpi.`plan_num` = lfr.`plan_num` -- AND lfr.`patient_status` = 1 AND lpi.`plan_duty_per` = lau.`admin_id` AND lfr.`form_id` = lfi.`form_num` AND lfr.patient_id = #{patientId}

SELECT lsp.`patient_date_time`, lau.`admin_name`, lsp.`suggess`, lsi.`satisfy_num`, lsi.`satisfy_name`, lsp.`form_redord_id`, lspl.discover_person, CASE lsp.`finish_type` WHEN -1 THEN '收案' WHEN 1 THEN '未完成' WHEN 2 THEN '已完成' WHEN 3 THEN '已过期' WHEN 4 THEN '无法接听' WHEN 5 THEN '号码错误' WHEN 6 THEN '拒绝接听' WHEN 7 THEN '无人接听' WHEN 8 THEN '家属接听' WHEN 9 THEN '患者不合作' WHEN 10 THEN '无联系电话' WHEN 11 THEN '其他' ELSE '其他' END AS state FROM `leanin_satisfy_patient` lsp,`leanin_satisfy_info` lsi,`leanin_admin_user` lau,`leanin_satisfy_plan` lspl WHERE lsp.`satisfy_plan_num` = lspl.`plan_satisfy_num` AND lspl.`discover_person` = lau.`admin_id` AND lsi.`satisfy_num` = lsp.`form_id` AND lsp.patient_id = #{patientId}

SELECT lmsr.`msg_send_date`, lau.`admin_name`, lmsr.`msg_send_num`, lst.`msg_topic_title`, lst.`msg_content`, lst.`msg_topic_creater` FROM `leanin_msg_send_record` lmsr,`leanin_msg_topic` lst,`leanin_admin_user` lau WHERE lmsr.`plan_type` = 4 AND lmsr.`msg_send_status` = 2 AND lmsr.`plan_num` = lst.`msg_topic_id` AND lst.`msg_topic_creater` = lau.`admin_id` AND lmsr.`patient_id` = #{patientId}

SELECT lcli.`call_start_time`, lcli.`call_creater_id`, lcli.`customer_number`, lcli.`holding_time`, lcli.call_creater_name, lcli.`call_log_info_id` FROM `leanin_call_log_info` lcli WHERE lcli.`customer_id` = #{patientId}
